links.evidence: To intervene the ion channel function we treated 3a-WT-transfected Vero E6 cells with ion channel blockers, 4-aminopyridine (AP) or Ba, and found that both inhibitors were able to suppress 3a-WT-induced nuclear condensation (Fig. 6F).
